testsuite.name: 4 - I should be able to use the File API

testcase.name: 4 - I should be able to use the File API EX-4-1 Should use basename(path)
4 - I should be able to use the File API EX-4-2 Should use dirname(path)
4 - I should be able to use the File API EX-4-3 Should use file_ext(file_path)

failure.message:
Timed out retrying: cy.dblclick() failed because this element is detached from the DOM.
Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them. The previous command that ran was: > cy.eq() This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command. Common situations why this happens: - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element You typically need to re-query for the element or add 'guards' which delay Cypress from running new commands. https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom

testcase.name: 4 - I should be able to use the File API EX-4-4 Should use remove_ext(file_path, ext=None)
4 - I should be able to use the File API EX-4-5 Should use replace_ext(file_path, new_ext, old_ext=None)
testcase.classname: EX-4-5 Should use replace_ext(file_path, new_ext, old_ext=None)
